text: == Eventos == * Mânio Acílio Glabrião e Públio Cornélio Cipião Násica, cônsules romanos.George Crabb, Universal Historical Dictionary: Or Explanation of the Names of Persons and Places in the Departments of Biblical, Political and Eccles.
